## InitHandler type

Init handler function type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type InitHandler<State, Components extends Record<string, unknown>> = (ctx: InitContext<State, Components>) => void;
```
**References:** [InitContext](./dsl.initcontext.md)

## Remarks

Init handlers are registered via `AppBuilder.onInit()` and are called once when the application starts. They receive an [InitContext](./dsl.initcontext.md) that allows scheduling initial commands.
